keyword: how many calories in a chicken leg
title: How Many Calories in a Chicken Leg?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in a chicken leg, including protein, fat, carbs, and full nutrition details for roasted with skin.
h1: How Many Calories in a Chicken Leg?
assumptions: Roasted chicken leg quarter (drumstick + thigh), with skin, bone-in, average size ~130g edible portion.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by chicken size, cooking method, skin removal, and seasonings. Check labels or sources for specifics.

quick_answer.text: One roasted chicken leg with skin provides ~270 kcal and ~28 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in a chicken leg with skin?
faqs.a: About 270 kcal for one roasted chicken leg with skin.

faqs.q: What is the protein in a chicken leg?
faqs.a: Roughly 28 g protein per roasted chicken leg.

faqs.q: Are chicken legs high in fat?
faqs.a: Yes, with skin: ~16 g total fat, including 4.5 g saturated.
Around 170 kcal, as skin adds significant fat and calories.

faqs.q: Does cooking method affect calories in chicken leg?
faqs.a: Yesâ€”roasted is lower than fried, which can add 100+ kcal from oil.
